languages.text: "Я думаю, этот мон-кай оказался здесь не случайно — он был в руках моих темных кузенов. Возможно, его состояние — горький плод времени, проведенного подле мастеров мучения и безумия".

traits.locale_text: "Я думаю, этот мон-кай оказался здесь не случайно — он был в руках моих темных кузенов. Возможно, его состояние — горький плод времени, проведенного подле мастеров мучения и безумия".

languages.text: "I believe this mon-keigh is not here by chance — he has been in the clutches of the Dark Ones. His current state may be the bitter fruit of time spent alongside those masters of torment and madness."
languages.original_text: "Я думаю, этот мон-кай оказался здесь не случайно — он был в руках моих темных кузенов. Возможно, его состояние — горький плод времени, проведенного подле мастеров мучения и безумия".

traits.locale_text: "I believe this mon-keigh is not here by chance — he has been in the clutches of my dark cousins. His current state may be the bitter fruit of time spent alongside those masters of torment and madness."

"I believe this mon-keigh is not here by chance — he has been in the clutches of my dark cousins. His current state may be the bitter fruit of time spent alongside those masters of torment and madness."

"I believe this mon-keigh is not here by chance — he has been in the clutches of my dark cousins. His current state may be the bitter fruit of time spent alongside those masters of torment and madness."

"I believe this mon-keigh is not here by chance — he has been in the clutches of the Dark Ones. His current state may be the bitter fruit of time spent alongside those masters of torment and madness."

languages.text: 「このモン＝ケイは偶然ここにいたわけではないだろう…暗黒の者の手中に落ちてしまったのだと思われる。今の彼の状態は、拷問と狂気の達人たちと長い時を共にした結果なのかもしれない」
languages.original_text: "I believe this mon-keigh is not here by chance — he has been in the clutches of the Dark Ones. His current state may be the bitter fruit of time spent alongside those masters of torment and madness."

traits.locale_text: 「このモン＝ケイは偶然ここにいたわけではないだろう――暗黒の者の手中に落ちてしまったのだと思われる。今の彼の状態は、拷問と狂気の達人たちと長い時を共にした結果なのかもしれない」

languages.text: “这个猴子会出现在这里，我认为这并非偶然，他已经被黑暗子嗣控制了。他如今变成了这个样子，很可能是因为他和那些痛苦与疯狂的大师在一起待了太久。”
languages.original_text: "I believe this mon-keigh is not here by chance — he has been in the clutches of the Dark Ones. His current state may be the bitter fruit of time spent alongside those masters of torment and madness."

traits.locale_text: “这个猴子会出现在这里，我认为这并非偶然，他已经被黑暗子嗣控制了。他如今变成了这个样子，很可能是因为他和那些痛苦与疯狂的大师在一起待了太久。”

languages.text: «Creo que la presencia de este mon-keigh no es casualidad. Ha sido presa de los Oscuros. Su estado actual probablemente sea un amargo fruto del tiempo pasado entre esos maestros de la tortura y la locura».
languages.original_text: "I believe this mon-keigh is not here by chance — he has been in the clutches of the Dark Ones. His current state may be the bitter fruit of time spent alongside those masters of torment and madness."

traits.locale_text: «Creo que la presencia de este mon-keigh no es casualidad. Ha sido presa de los Oscuros. Su estado actual probablemente sea un amargo fruto del tiempo pasado entre esos maestros de la tortura y la locura».

languages.text: « Je ne crois pas que ce mon-keigh soit ici par hasard, il est sous l'emprise des Drukharis. Son état est sans doute la tragique conséquence du temps passé aux côtés de ces maîtres du tourment et de la folie. »
languages.original_text: "I believe this mon-keigh is not here by chance — he has been in the clutches of the Dark Ones. His current state may be the bitter fruit of time spent alongside those masters of torment and madness."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne crois pas que ce mon-keigh soit ici par hasard, il est sous l'emprise des Drukharis. Son état est sans doute la tragique conséquence du temps passé aux côtés de ces maîtres du tourment et de la folie. »

languages.text: "Ich glaube, dieser Chem-Pan-Sey ist nicht zufällig hier – er war in den Klauen der Dunklen. Sein derzeitiger Zustand könnte die bittere Frucht der Zeit sein, die er unter diesen Meistern von Folter und Wahnsinn verbracht hat."
languages.original_text: "I believe this mon-keigh is not here by chance — he has been in the clutches of the Dark Ones. His current state may be the bitter fruit of time spent alongside those masters of torment and madness."

traits.locale_text: "Ich glaube, dieser Chem-Pan-Sey ist nicht zufällig hier – er war in den Klauen der Dunklen. Sein derzeitiger Zustand könnte die bittere Frucht der Zeit sein, die er unter diesen Meistern von Folter und Wahnsinn verbracht hat."

languages.text: "Bu mon-keigh'in burada tesadüfen bulunmadığına inanıyorum. Karalar'ın avucunun içine düşmüş. Şu anki durumu; işkence ve deliliğin efendilerinin yanında geçirdiği zamanın acı bir meyvesi olabilir."
languages.original_text: "I believe this mon-keigh is not here by chance — he has been in the clutches of the Dark Ones. His current state may be the bitter fruit of time spent alongside those masters of torment and madness."

traits.locale_text: "Bu mon-keigh'in burada tesadüfen bulunmadığına inanıyorum. Karalar'ın avucunun içine düşmüş. Şu anki durumu; işkence ve deliliğin efendilerinin yanında geçirdiği zamanın acı bir meyvesi olabilir."
